 f \circ \sigma(f \circ \rho).$ We also need below the set $\mathbb{T}^\kappa$ which
 is derived from the time scale $\mathbb{T}$ as follows: If
 $\mathbb{T}$ has a left-scattered maximum $m$, then

\leqslant t \leqslant b\}$.
